You pop the moonroot herb into your mouth with an awfully loud, unsatisfying crunch. Still next to you, Aelriss winces on your behalf.

> [[ PP: 6 / 6 ]]
> [[ Moonroot Poisoning: Dizzy ]]

“Ashe? Did you just eat a raw moonroot?” Aelriss asks. “Those will make you sick, you know.”

“Yeah.” You burp, then stumble a bit. It tastes like ginger, but a bit stale. “I like the challenge.”

“Plus, the apothecary in Averron died in the riot, which means no elixirs unless we figure out how to craft them ourselves, if we even can.” Ayla adds. “A lot of the NPCs haven't respawned, actually. It's disconcerting.”

“It's not so bad.” Vyx folds her arms. “It means tasty, tasty moonroot for everyone.”

“I guess if that's the best we can do to prepare. We should all try to get our HP and PP up.” Andor sighs. “I hope we've all got an excess of recovery items?”

“I'm a little low.” Donnel says. “I guess I didn't quite know what to expect.”

“Well, uh.” Evidently done checking the table and chairs for traps, Nel's going over the assortment of foods. “There's like, a ton of moonroot over here.”
